captions.text: We're here in Chiesa Malenco for the first Red Bull Innsnowation stop.
Red Bull Innsnowation is a contest between invited Italian snowparks to create a particular setup at they're snowpark.
The saying of the Innsnowation tour is: Design it, build it, ride it.
The following snowparks took part in the Red Bull Innsnowation in Italy: Chiesa Valmalenc, the Palù park,
the Monte Bondone park in Trentino and the Gentleman riders park Val Senales.
Every snowpark brings they're own team of two snowboarders and two skiers, one pro and one amateur for both disciplines.
The cool thing about the setup is the multifunction. We included some setup jumps and also rails;
more people can ride the setup at the same time starting from the same moment. Last but not least, check out the landscape!
They have built a very cool setup: 2 little step downs and a pole jam which are the first part of the setup.
The second part is composed of a pipe, a little jump in the middle and a huge wheel to do bonks.
The setups name is Arena. You can get in from many different angles. It's very amazing for the crowd.
The setups are easy, not very huge but riders have the opportunity to express themselves and they rock at it!
The Winners are: Simon Gruber for Pro Snowboard and Denis Battisti for Pro Ski.
Christof Schenk in amateur ski and Matteo Zappaterra in amateur Snowboard.
Thanks everybody, thank you. We love you, we rocked! Palù park rocks!

title: Ski & Snow Contest in Italy - Red Bull Innsnowation 2013 - Part 1
